My Projects

All of my projects are on my Github page. Most of them are made with Html, Css and Vanilla Javascript. Currently I keep learning React.

Trading Journal

Trading Journal project made with React, Redux, Apex Charts and Firestore for self learning. It has lots of features such as balance charts, filtering, adding deleting etc.

Forex Alerts

Project designed for use in a trading group. Major features include alerts for Forex pairs (price data by Free Forex API), trade journaling, invidual trader and whole group statistics. This is a collaboration project with my friend Adrian. Check out his Github here.
